WRITING.TITLE: When you enter r/Animemes and they are not lewding lolis
You are all going to jail

WRITING.TEXT: I'm actually saying that it's weird how Luffy wasn't able to "repel" the attack and instead was swallowed in. If you think that Haki makes the Logia "touchable" then it should also imply that you should be able to hit them freely but this might be different for his fruit

WRITING.TITLE: Personal reflection on the latest chapter [SPOILER]

WRITING.TEXT: Erm I don't know, she probably has made other Kuja pirates her bitches tbh
He's very similar to Luffy but I agree he could have done the deed
I'd say Nami too, she's been all around the East Blue on multiple Pirate ships, I'd guess she's had her share of fun too
Yeah, it was a silly assumption to make in the first place and it was also common for older samurai to "introduce to the ways of the world" their personal disciples back in Feudal Japan
